top100.name: Excalidraw
top100.author: Zsolt Viczian
top100.description: Edit and view Excalidraw drawings.

top100.name: Tasks
top100.author: Clare Macrae and Ilyas Landikov (created by Martin Schenck)
top100.description: Track tasks across your vault. Supports due dates, recurring tasks, done dates, sub-set of checklist items, and filtering.

top100.name: Kanban
top100.author: mgmeyers
top100.description: Create Markdown-backed Kanban boards.

top100.name: Git
top100.author: Vinzent, (Denis Olehov)
top100.description: Integrate Git version control with automatic backup and other advanced features.

top100.name: Style Settings
top100.author: mgmeyers
top100.description: Adjust theme, plugin, and snippet CSS variables.

top100.name: Iconize
top100.author: FlorianWoelki
top100.description: Add icons to anything in Obsidian, including files, folders, and text.

top100.name: Minimal Theme Settings
top100.author: @kepano
top100.description: Control the colors and fonts in Minimal Theme.

top100.name: Outliner
top100.author: Viacheslav Slinko
top100.description: Work with your lists like in Workflowy or Roam Research.

top100.name: Importer
top100.author: Obsidian
top100.description: Import data from Notion, Evernote, Apple Notes, Microsoft OneNote, Google Keep, Bear, Roam, and HTML files.

top100.name: Admonition
top100.author: Jeremy Valentine
top100.description: Admonition block-styled content.

top100.name: Advanced Slides
top100.author: MSzturc
top100.description: Create Markdown-based presentations.

top100.name: Linter
top100.author: Victor Tao
top100.description: Format and style your notes. Linter can be used to format YAML tags, aliases, arrays, and metadata; footnotes; headings; spacing; math blocks; regular Markdown contents like list, italics, and bold styles; and more with the use of custom rule options.

top100.name: Mind Map
top100.author: James Lynch
top100.description: Display Markdown notes as mind maps using Markmap.

top100.name: Day Planner
top100.author: James Lynch (continued by Ivan Lednev)
top100.description: Day planning from a task list in a Markdown note with enhanced time block functionality.

top100.name: Annotator
top100.author: Elias Sundqvist
top100.description: Read and annotate PDFs and EPUB files.

top100.name: Advanced URI
top100.author: Vinzent
top100.description: Control everything with URI.

top100.name: Self-hosted LiveSync
top100.author: vorotamoroz
top100.description: Community implementation of self-hosted livesync. Reflect your vault changes to some other devices immediately. Please make sure to disable other synchronize solutions to avoid content corruption or duplication.

top100.name: Text Generator
top100.author: Noureddine Haouari
top100.description: Generate text content using GPT-3 (OpenAI).

top100.name: Markmind
top100.author: Mark
top100.description: Mind map, outline and PDF annotation tool. (Closed source)

top100.name: Pandoc
top100.author: Oliver Balfour
top100.description: Commands to export to Pandoc-supported formats like DOCX, ePub and PDF.

top100.name: Hover Editor
top100.author: NothingIsLost
top100.description: Transform the Page Preview hover popover into a fully working editor instance.

top100.name: Zotero Integration
top100.author: mgmeyers
top100.description: Insert and import citations, bibliographies, notes, and PDF annotations from Zotero.

top100.name: Spaced Repetition
top100.author: Stephen Mwangi
top100.description: Fight the forgetting curve by reviewing flashcards & entire notes.

top100.name: Checklist
top100.author: delashum
top100.description: Consolidate checklists across all files into a single view.

top100.name: Emoji Toolbar
top100.author: oliveryh
top100.description: Quickly search for and insert emojis into your editor.

top100.name: Latex Suite
top100.author: artisticat1
top100.description: Make typesetting LaTeX math as fast as handwriting through snippets, text expansion, and editor enhancements.

top100.name: Full Calendar
top100.author: Davis Haupt (@davish)
top100.description: Keep events and manage your calendar alongside all your other notes in your vault.

top100.name: Hider
top100.author: @kepano
top100.description: Hide UI elements such as tooltips, status, titlebar and more.

top100.name: Enhancing Export
top100.author: YISH
top100.description: Enhanced export based on Pandoc. Allows export to formats like HTML, DOCX, ePub and PDF or Hugo.

top100.name: Auto Link Title
top100.author: Matt Furden
top100.description: Automatically fetches the titles of links from the web.

top100.name: Banners
top100.author: Danny Hernandez
top100.description: Add banner images to your notes!

top100.name: Thino
top100.author: Boninall
top100.description: Quickly capture memos and display them in the sidebar with a heatmap. (Closed source)

top100.name: Meta Bind
top100.author: Moritz Jung
top100.description: Make your notes interactive with inline input fields, metadata displays, and buttons.

top100.name: Tracker
top100.author: pyrochlore
top100.description: Track occurrences and numbers in your notes.

top100.name: Charts
top100.author: phibr0
top100.description: Easily create interactive charts in your notes.

top100.name: Reminder
top100.author: uphy
top100.description: Manage Markdown TODOs with reminder.

top100.name: Fantasy Statblocks
top100.author: Jeremy Valentine
top100.description: Create, manage and view a Fantasy Bestiary with Dungeons and Dragons style statblocks.

top100.name: LanguageTool Integration
top100.author: Clemens Ertle
top100.description: advanced spell/grammar checks with the help of language-tool.

top100.name: Leaflet
top100.author: Jeremy Valentine
top100.description: Interactive maps inside your notes.

top100.name: Dice Roller
top100.author: Jeremy Valentine
top100.description: Add a little randomness to your notes!

top100.name: Quiet Outline
top100.author: the_tree
top100.description: Make outline quiet and more powerful, including no-auto-expand, rendering heading as Markdown, and search support.

top100.name: Enhancing Mindmap
top100.author: Mark
top100.description: Edit mindmaps with Markdown.

top100.name: Citations
top100.author: Jon Gauthier
top100.description: Automatically search and insert citations from a Zotero library.

top100.name: Custom Frames
top100.author: Ellpeck
top100.description: Turn web apps into panes using iframes with custom styling. Also comes with presets for Google Keep, Todoist and more.

top100.name: TagFolder
top100.author: vorotamoroz
top100.description: Show tags as folder.

top100.name: Dictionary
top100.author: phibr0
top100.description: A multilingual dictionary that shows word definitions in the sidebar and popover synonyms.

top100.name: Local REST API
top100.author: Adam Coddington
top100.description: Unlock your automation needs by interacting with your notes over a secure REST API.

top100.name: Text Format
top100.author: Benature
top100.description: Format selected text upper/lower/capitalize.

top100.name: Table of Contents
top100.author: hipstersmoothie
top100.description: Create a table of contents for a note.

top100.name: Book Search
top100.author: anpigon
top100.description: Create book notes and insert book metadata from providers including Google Books and Naver.

top100.name: File Color
top100.author: ecustic
top100.description: Set colors on folders and files in the file tree.

top100.name: Excel to Markdown Table
top100.author: Ganessh Kumar R P
top100.description: Paste data from Microsoft Excel, Google Sheets, Apple Numbers and LibreOffice Calc as Markdown tables.

top100.name: Plugin Update Tracker
top100.author: Steven Swartz
top100.description: Know when installed plugins have updates and evaluate the risk of upgrading.

top100.name: Footnote Shortcut
top100.author: Alexis Rondeau, Micha Brugger
top100.description: Makes creating footnotes more fun!

top100.name: Smart Typography
top100.author: mgmeyers
top100.description: Convert quotes to curly quotes, dashes to em dashes, and periods to ellipses.

top100.name: Kindle Highlights
top100.author: Hady Osman
top100.description: Sync your Kindle book highlights using your Amazon login or uploading your My Clippings file.

top100.name: Custom Attachment Location
top100.author: RainCat1998
top100.description: Customize attachment location with variables($filename, $data, etc) like Typora.

top100.name: Vimrc Support
top100.author: esm
top100.description: Auto-load a startup file with Vim commands.

top100.name: Rollover Daily Todos
top100.author: Matt Sessions
top100.description: Rollover any unchecked checkboxes from your last daily note into today's note.

top100.name: Omnivore
top100.author: Omnivore
top100.description: Import your saved Omnivore articles and highlights.

top100.name: Map View
top100.author: esm
top100.description: An interactive map view for your notes.

top100.name: Another Quick Switcher
top100.author: tadashi-aikawa
top100.description: Another choice of Quick switcher.

top100.name: ReadItLater
top100.author: Dominik Pieper
top100.description: Save online content to your Vault, utilize embedded template engine and organize your reading list to your needs. Preserve the web with ReadItLater.

top100.name: Weread
top100.author: hank zhao
top100.description: Sync Tencent Weread highlights and annotations.

top100.name: Task Genius
top100.author: Boninall
top100.description: Comprehensive task management that includes progress bars, task status cycling, and advanced task tracking features.

top100.name: PlantUML
top100.author: Johannes Theiner
top100.description: Generate PlantUML diagrams.

top100.name: List Callouts
top100.author: mgmeyers
top100.description: Create simple callouts in lists.

top100.name: Image auto upload
top100.author: renmu123
top100.description: Upload images from your clipboard by PicGo.

top100.name: Export to Anki
top100.author: Pseudonium
top100.description: Anki integration designed for efficient bulk exporting. Previously known as Obsidian_to_Anki.

top100.name: Markdown Formatting Assistant
top100.author: Reocin
top100.description: A formatting sidebar for Markdown and a command line interface to facilitate a faster workflow.

top100.name: Local images plus
top100.author: catalysm, aleksey-rezvov, Sergei Korneev
top100.description: A reincarnation of Local Images to download images in Markdown notes to local storage.

top100.name: Paste image rename
top100.author: Reorx
top100.description: Rename image after pasting, support name pattern and auto renaming.

top100.name: Zoom
top100.author: Viacheslav Slinko
top100.description: Zoom into heading and lists.

top100.name: PDF Highlights
top100.author: Alexis Rondeau
top100.description: Extract highlights, underlines and annotations from your PDFs.

top100.name: Contextual Typography
top100.author: mgmeyers
top100.description: Add a data-tag-name attribute to all top-level divs in preview mode containing the child's tag name, allowing contextual typography styling.

top100.name: Icons
top100.author: Camillo Visini
top100.description: Add icons to your notes.

top100.name: Reading Time
top100.author: avr
top100.description: Add the current note's reading time to the status bar.

top100.name: Relative Line Numbers
top100.author: Nadav Spiegelman
top100.description: Enable relative line numbers in editor mode.

top100.name: Mindmap Nextgen
top100.author: VeroCloud Pty Ltd (original by James Lynch)
top100.description: Preview notes as Markmap mind maps.

top100.name: Link Embed
top100.author: SErAphLi
top100.description: Convert URLs in your notes into embeded previews.

top100.name: Completr
top100.author: tth05
top100.description: Advanced auto-completion for LaTeX, frontmatter, and standard writing.

top100.name: Columns
top100.author: Trevor Nichols
top100.description: Create columns in Markdown.

top100.name: TODO | Text-based GTD
top100.author: Lars Lockefeer
top100.description: Collect all outstanding TODOs from your vault and presents them in lists Today, Scheduled, Inbox and Someday/Maybe.

top100.name: Charts View
top100.author: caronchen
top100.description: Visualize data from your notes with plots and graphs.

top100.name: Timeline
top100.author: George Butco
top100.description: Build great timelines.

top100.name: Pandoc Reference List
top100.author: mgmeyers
top100.description: Display a formatted reference in the sidebar for each Pandoc citekey present in the current document.

top100.name: Image Toolkit
top100.author: sissilab
top100.description: Click images to preview with zoom, move, rotate, flip, invert, and copy.

top100.name: Shell commands
top100.author: Jarkko Linnanvirta
top100.description: Define system commands that you want to execute via command palette, hotkeys, URI links or automated events. E.g. open external applications or perform automated file modifications.

top100.name: JSON/CSV Importer
top100.author: farling42
top100.description: Import a JSON file containing an array of data, creating notes from a Handlebars template file.

top100.name: Focus Mode
top100.author: ryanpcmcquen
top100.description: Add a toggle to hide interface elements so you can focus on your note.

top100.name: Force note view mode
top100.author: Benny Wydooghe
top100.description: Force the view mode for a note by using frontmatter: YAML block with 'obsidian_ui_mode' as key.

top100.name: Copy Block Link
top100.author: mgmeyers
top100.description: Get links to blocks and headings from the right-click menu.

top100.name: Filename Heading Sync
top100.author: dvcrn
top100.description: Keep the filename with the first heading of a file in sync.

top100.name: Collapse All
top100.author: Nathonius
top100.description: Extend collapse/expand all with commands that can be bound to hotkeys.

top100.name: Status Bar Pomodoro Timer
top100.author: kzhovn
top100.description: Add a pomodoro timer to your status bar.

top100.name: Imgur
top100.author: Kirill Gavrilov
top100.description: Upload images from your clipboard to imgur.com and embeds uploaded image to your note.

top100.name: Underline
top100.author: Benature
top100.description: Add underline with shortcut.

top100.name: Regex Find/Replace
top100.author: Martin Eder
top100.description: A find/replace dialog which optionally supports regular expressions and scope (full document or text selection).

top100.name: Icon Shortcodes
top100.author: AidenLx
top100.description: Insert emoji and custom icons with shortcodes.

top100.name: Table Generator
top100.author: Boninall
top100.description: Generate Markdown tables quickly like Typora.
